# Core Rule 4 - Players in vital job roles require effort.
As a head of staff competency is expected.
As security a degree of competency is expected.
As important roles such as engineer or doctor, a degree of competency is expected.
Cryo if possible, especially as command or security.
Antagonists are exempt from these rules.
## Examples
### [bold] Permitted [/bold]
- It is ok to make mistakes as important roles. - It is ok to leave the game in emergecy situations. - Doing any of these things as an antagonist.
### [bold] Not Permitted [/bold]
- Don't consistantly make the same mistakes over and over. - Consistantly closing the game without cryoing. - Not doing your job as an engineer and leaving the station in darkness.
